trans-unit.source: Abstract class that, when implemented represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> that may contain a collection of child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 實作時，抽象類別 (Abstract Class)，表示可能包含子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 物件集合 (Collection) 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup> can be a child of another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup>可以是另一個子系<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class, with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設屬性來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 類別的新執行個體 (Instance)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 初始化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />，初始化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />，初始化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The object to be added as the child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 要加入成為這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 之子系的物件。

trans-unit.source: If this object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> it will be added to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" /> collection; otherwise, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個物件為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />，則會將其加入至 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" /> 集合，否則會擲回例外狀況 (Exception)。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 將子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 加入至這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: The parameter <paramref name="child" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="child" /> 參數不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />。

trans-unit.source: The text added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.
trans-unit.target: 加入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 的文字。

trans-unit.source: Adds a text string as a child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.
trans-unit.target: 將文字字串當做這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 的子系加入。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise an InvalididOperationException unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>不接受文字做為子系，因此這個方法會引發 InvalididOperationException，除非在衍生的類別已覆寫允許加入文字的這項行為。

trans-unit.source: Creates a type-specific clock for this timeline.
trans-unit.target: 為這個時刻表建立特定型別的時鐘。

trans-unit.source: A clock for this timeline.
trans-unit.target: 這個時刻表的時鐘。

trans-unit.source: If a derived class overrides this method, it should only create and return an object of a class inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.
trans-unit.target: 如果在衍生的類別覆寫這個方法，它只應該建立及傳回物件的類別，繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of direct child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 之直接子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 物件集合。

trans-unit.source: Child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 的子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是**null**。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children%2A> 相依性屬性的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" /> object, using this instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個執行個體產生新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的子物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: 加入子物件。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要加入物件中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 將節點的文字內容加入物件中。
